gameData

Class XMLhandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameData.XMLhandler

  • public class XMLhandler
extends Object
    XMLhandler handles loading and saving game information from files.
    Author:
    Marcin Szymkowiak

      • XMLhandler

           throws XMLStreamException,

        Throws:
        XMLStreamException
        FileNotFoundException
        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • loadRandomEvents

        private void loadRandomEvents(ArrayList<Activity> ActivityList)
                       throws XMLStreamException,
                              NumberFormatException,
                              NullPointerException
        Searches Events.xml file in order to find RandomEvents and saves them in ArrayList. XMLStreamReader is used. Each element is checked if it's name is 'RandomEvent" or one of RandomEvent's parameters. If it's "RandomEvent", new RandomEvent object is created, if it's one of parameters, it's value (parsed to other type than String if needed) is added with corresponding RandomEvent's setter to previously created object. If parameter's name is "ActivityName", ActivityList is searched for Activity with the same name as this parameter value and this RandomEvent object is added to this Activity's RandomEvent list. If value equals "ALL" this object is added to all Activities. NOTE: Method doesn't check if variable temp is not null, so there is a possibility of NullPointerException if the XML file is not written correctly.
        Parameters:
        ActivityList - List of activities to which RandomEvents should be added.
        Throws:
        XMLStreamException
        NumberFormatException
        NullPointerException
        See Also:
        XMLStreamReader

      • randName

        private String randName(RandomAccessFile raf)
                 throws IOException
        Draws random name from file. To set a pointer in RAF to start of random line calls searchLine(java.io.RandomAccessFile, int) method. To get String value of line starting in drawn pointer calls readLine(java.io.RandomAccessFile) method.
        Parameters:
        raf - RandomAccessFile related with file in which we want to draw single line.
        Returns:
        Drawn line.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • readLine

        private String readLine(RandomAccessFile raf)
                 throws UnsupportedEncodingException,
                        IOException
        Reads line and returns it as String.
        Parameters:
        raf - RandomAccessFile
        Returns:
        Read line.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException
        IOException

      • searchLecturer

        private Lecturer searchLecturer(String id)
        Search local list of lecturers in order to find one with same ID parameter as one given.
        Parameters:
        id - Lecturer's ID to be found.
        Returns:
        Searched Lecturer or null if list doesn't contain Lecturer with ID from parameter

      • searchLine

        private long searchLine(RandomAccessFile raf,
              int znak)
                 throws IOException
        Draws random pointer position. (setting it on the start of line)
        Parameters:
        raf - RandomAccessFile
        znak - Sign to be searched. (integer value UTF-8)
        Returns:
        Pointer position.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • write

        private void write(String Element,
         String value)
            throws XMLStreamException
        Writes single element with two tabs before start element.
        Parameters:
        Element - Name of element
        value - Value of element value
        Throws:
        XMLStreamException

      • drawName

        public String[] drawName()
                  throws FileNotFoundException,
                         IOException
        Draws gender, degree, name and surname. Creates three instances of RandomAccessFile and calls randName(java.io.RandomAccessFile) method for each string to be drawn.
        Returns:
        Array with 3 elements. 0 - degree, 1 - name, 2 - surname
        Throws:
        IOException
        FileNotFoundException
        See Also:
        RandomAccessFile

      • loadActivities

        public ArrayList<Activity> loadActivities()
                                   throws XMLStreamException,
                                          NumberFormatException,
                                          NullPointerException
        Searches Activities.xml file in order to find Activities and saves them in ArrayList. XMLStreamReader is used. Each element is checked if it's name is 'Activity" or one of Activity's parameters. If it's "Item" new Activity object is created, if it's one of parameters, it's value (parsed to other type than String if needed) is added with corresponding Activity's setter to previously created object. NOTE: Method doesn't check if variable temp is not null, so there is a possibility of NullPointerException if the XML file is not written correctly.
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing Activities
        Throws:
        NullPointerException
        XMLStreamException
        NumberFormatException
        See Also:
        Activity, XMLStreamReader

      • loadCalendar

        public GameCalendar loadCalendar(String path)
                          throws FileNotFoundException,
                                 XMLStreamException
        Loads GameCalendar object from given file. XMLStreamReader is used. Each element is checked if it's name is "CalendarActivity". All values of elements which has correct name are written to array CalendarActivities. After loading all strings to array, the array is used as a parameter for GameCalendar constructor.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to saved game file.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException
        XMLStreamException

      • loadCourses

        public ArrayList<Course> loadCourses(String path)
                              throws FileNotFoundException,
                                     XMLStreamException,
                                     NumberFormatException
        Searches given file in order to find Courses and saves them in ArrayList. XMLStreamReader is used. Each element is checked if it's name is 'Course" or one of Course's parameters. If it's "Course" new Course object is created, if it's one of parameters, it's value (parsed to other type than String if needed) is added with corresponding Course's setter to previously created object. If parameter's name is "LecturerID" Method searchLecturer is called to find and add lecturer with this ID.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to file from which Courses should be loaded.
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing Courses
        Throws:
        NullPointerException
        NumberFormatException
        FileNotFoundException
        XMLStreamException
        See Also:
        XMLStreamReader

      • loadDistribution

        public ArrayList<Distribution> loadDistribution()
                                         throws XMLStreamException,
                                                NumberFormatException
        Searches Distributions.xml file in order to find Distributions and saves them in ArrayList. XMLStreamReader is used. Each element is checked if it's name is 'Distribution" or Distribution parameter. If it's "Distribution" new Distribution object is created, if it's parameter, it's value is parsed to Integer and added with corresponding Distribution's setter to previously created object. NOTE: Method doesn't check if variable temp is not null, so there is a possibility of NullPointerException if the XML file is not written correctly.
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing Distributions
        Throws:
        XMLStreamException
        NumberFormatException
        NullPointerException
        See Also:
        XMLStreamReader

      • loadGameParameters

        public void loadGameParameters(String path)
                        throws FileNotFoundException,
                               XMLStreamException
        Loads game parameters from given file.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to file where game parameters are stored.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException
        XMLStreamException

      • loadItems

        public ArrayList<Item> loadItems(String path)
                          throws XMLStreamException,
                                 NumberFormatException,
                                 NullPointerException,
                                 FileNotFoundException
        Searches given file in order to find Items and saves them in ArrayList. XMLStreamReader is used. Each element is checked if it's name is 'Item" or one of Item's parameters. If it's "Item" new Item object is created, if it's one of parameters, it's value (parsed to other type than String if needed) is added with corresponding Item's setter to previously created object. NOTE: Method doesn't check if variable temp is not null, so there is a possibility of NullPointerException if the XML file is not written correctly.
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing Items
        Throws:
        XMLStreamException
        NumberFormatException
        NullPointerException
        FileNotFoundException
        See Also:
        Item, XMLStreamReader

      • loadLecturers

        public ArrayList<Lecturer> loadLecturers(String path)
                                  throws FileNotFoundException,
                                         XMLStreamException,
                                         NumberFormatException,
                                         NullPointerException
        Searches given file in order to find Lecturers and saves them in ArrayList. XMLStreamReader is used. Each element is checked if it's name is 'Lecturer" or one of Lecturer's parameters. If it's "Lecturer" new Lecturer object is created, if it's one of parameters, it's value (parsed to other type than String if needed) is added with corresponding Lecturer's setter to previously created object.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to file from which Lecturers should be loaded.
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing loaded Lecturers
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundEsception
        XMLStreamException
        NumberFormatException
        NullPointerException
        FileNotFoundException
        See Also:
        XMLStreamReader, Lecturer

      • loadLog

        public Log loadLog(String path)
            throws FileNotFoundException,
                   XMLStreamException
        Loads Log object from given file. XMLStreamReader is used. Each element is checked if it's name is 'LOGELEMENT". If so, it's value is added to already created Log object in this method.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to file from which Lecturers should be loaded.
        Returns:
        Log which contains log elements from save
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException
        XMLStreamException

      • loadPlayer

        public Player loadPlayer(String path)
                  throws FileNotFoundException,
                         XMLStreamException,
                         NumberFormatException,
                         NullPointerException
        Loads Player object from given file. XMLStreamReader is used. Each element is checked if it's name is 'Player" or one of Player's parameters. If it's "Player", new Player object is created, if it's one of parameters, it's value (parsed to other type than String if needed) is added with corresponding Player's setter to previously created object. NOTE: Method doesn't check if variable temp is not null, so there is a possibility of NullPointerException if the XML file is not written correctly.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to file where the game is saved.
        Returns:
        Loaded Player object.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException
        XMLStreamException
        NumberFormatException
        NullPointerException
        See Also:
        XMLStreamReader, Player

      • randHangmanQuestion

        public String[] randHangmanQuestion(String path)
                             throws FileNotFoundException,
                                    IOException
        Draws password and it's description for game: Hangman. Passwords are kept in /res/Hangman.txt Calls searchLine(java.io.RandomAccessFile, int) method to draw a pointer. Calls readLine(java.io.RandomAccessFile) method to get String value of drawn line.
        Returns:
        String array with two elements. 0 - password, 1 - description
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException
        IOException

      • saveGame

        public void saveGame(String path,
            Player player,
            GameCalendar calendar,
            ArrayList<Lecturer> lecturers,
            ArrayList<Course> courses,
            Log log)
              throws XMLStreamException,
                     IOException,
                     NullPointerException
        Saves games to given path. XMLStreamWriter is used.
        Parameters:
        path - Path where game should be saved. For example: "C:/Games/StudentSimulator2K13/Save.xml"
        player - Player object to be saved.
        calendar - GameCalendar object to be saved.
        lecturers - ArrayList containing Lecturers to be saved.
        courses - ArrayList containing Courses to be saved.
        Throws:
        XMLStreamException
        IOException
        NullPointerException
        See Also:
        XMLStreamWriter, Player, GameCalendar, Lecturer, Course
